title: Issue: Syntax Highlighting Does Not Match Consoul Theme
description:
Given: the user is on a light theme
When: streaming an assistant response that has code (in code blocks) and RichLog is rendering markdown
Then: the consoul color scheme/theme does not match the syntax highlighting theme

---

open questions:

1. can we map syntax highligthing themes to consoul/textual themes?

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content: Implemented theme-matched syntax highlighting for code blocks in message bubbles. Created mapping between Consoul themes and appropriate Pygments styles (monokai for dark themes, friendly for light theme, github-dark for OLED, etc.). Code blocks now automatically use syntax highlighting that matches the current Consoul theme.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content: Also updated StreamingResponse widget to use theme-matched syntax highlighting during streaming. Rich's Markdown constructor accepts code_theme parameter just like Textual's Markdown widget.
